front.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Rechargeable Batteries for Cellular Telephones

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Criteria for design analysis for qualification, quality, and reliability of rechargeable lithium ion batteries for host devices such as cellular telephone applications are established. Also included are: battery pack electrical and mechanical construction, packaging technologies, pack- and celllevel charge and discharge controls, and overall system considerations.
